title: I'm a Fashion Editor Who Loves Beauty—20 Finds I'm Eyeing for Spring
description: From luxurious cleansers to on-sale best sellers.
excerpt: A fashion editor shares her favorite beauty finds from QVC
text: Even though beauty and fashion seem to exist in separate worlds, they're so similar. Case in point: Selecting which lip combination to wear with your night-out glam is just like choosing which shoes match your outfit. From curating a personal style to discovering the perfect skincare routine and makeup look, fashion and beauty are how we express (and take care of) ourselves. That said, if you asked me to pick between the two, it'd be like choosing a favorite child—it simply isn't possible.With my spring capsule wardrobe in order, I'm looking to re-up on my favorite beauty products and try out some new recommendations. My destination? QVC. The retailer has a treasure trove of great beauty brands and exclusive deals you can't find elsewhere. From Tarte's best-selling Shape Tape Concealer (brush included!) for a quarter of the price to discounted Sunday Riley skincare to an entire collection of Bumble and Bumble haircare for under $100 (*screams*), the shopping opportunities are endless. Keep scrolling to see everything I'm eyeing from QVC.Prices taken at the time of publication. Tatcha The Rice Wash Soft Cream Cleanser Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo Tarte Shape Tape Concealer & Brush ELEMIS Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm Sunday Riley Good Genes Lactic Acid Treatment 1-Oz Duo The Outset Purifying Blue Clay Mask Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Lip Blush & Cheek Tint L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil T3 Airebrush Round One-Step Volumizing Hair Dryer Brush St. Tropez Purity Bronzing Water Face Mist Duo It Cosmetics CC+ Nude Glow SPF 40 Foundation Duo Iconic London Underglow Blurring Primer Tarte Maracuja Juicy Lip Try Me Trio Murad Retinol Youth Renewal Serum RMS Beauty Eyelights Luminous Cream Eyeshadow Trio Byredo Blanche Eau de Parfum Spray Bumble and Bumble. 4-Piece Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Grand Collection Peter Thomas Roth Peter Thomas Roth Cucumber De-Tox Hydra-Gel Eypatches Lancome Lash Idole Mascara
html:
Even though beauty and fashion seem to exist in separate worlds, they're so similar. Case in point: Selecting which lip combination to wear with your night-out glam is just like choosing which shoes match your outfit. From curating a personal style to discovering the perfect skincare routine and makeup look, fashion and beauty are how we express (and take care of) ourselves. That said, if you asked me to pick between the two, it'd be like choosing a favorite child—it simply isn't possible.

With my spring capsule wardrobe in order, I'm looking to re-up on my favorite beauty products and try out some new recommendations. My destination? QVC. The retailer has a treasure trove of great beauty brands and exclusive deals you can't find elsewhere. From Tarte's best-selling Shape Tape Concealer (brush included!) for a quarter of the price to discounted Sunday Riley skincare to an entire collection of Bumble and Bumble haircare for under $100 (*screams*), the shopping opportunities are endless. Keep scrolling to see everything I'm eyeing from QVC.

Prices taken at the time of publication.
